page.title: 04Hobbies of Class 3 Children
page.content: I like dancing.I go twice a week but when we practise for shows we go 3-4 times.I do ballet,tap,stage and acro. Lindsey Young. My hobby is doing tricks on my B.M.X. I can do bunny hops and wheelies. It is a very strong bike with strong wheels.A front hop is where you lift your back wheel up and hop on your front wheel. Simon Leak. My favourite hobby is Judo.The teacher is called John Godfrey but his Judo name is Sensi. Helen Boswell. My hobby is football.I play it about 3 hours a day.You play football with a ball.When you play you can head it, chest it and knee it,but most of the time you kick it. Steven Atkins. My hobby is reading because you can read adventure stories.My favourite story is Alice in Wonderland. Lesley Halstead.
